mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "order.id", a.express_id AS "express.id", express.name AS "express.name", express.code AS "express.code", a.shipping_number AS "number", a.shipping_date AS "shippingDate", a.freight_charge AS "freightCharge", a.shipping_note AS "note", u.name AS "operName", a.oper_date AS "operDate"
LEFT JOIN ec_order ord ON ord.id = a.order_id LEFT JOIN ec_express express ON express.id = a.express_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on a.oper_by = u.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ec_shipping a
WHERE 1=1
AND a.express_id = #{express.id}
ORDER BY a.id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ec_shipping( id, order_id, express_id, shipping_number, shipping_date, shipping_note, freight_charge, oper_by, oper_date )VALUES ( #{id}, #{order.id}, #{express.id}, #{number}, #{shippingDate}, #{note}, #{freightCharge}, #{currentUser.id}, NOW() )
